ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the buyer, S2 Resources Corp, is not mentioned in the text. The CEO mentioned, Chris Donaldson, is for the seller, Valkea Resources Corp.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states that the buyer can acquire an interest in a group of projects including Ballarat West: "S2 can earn an 80% interest in the Yuengroon, Ballarat West and Silver Spoon projects by sole-funding total expenditures of A$1.2 million within four years."

currency.justification: The exploration commitment is denominated in Australian Dollars, as indicated by the 'A$' prefix in the text: "sole-funding total expenditures of A$1.2 million within four years."

cash_payments_raw.justification: The documents do not mention any cash payments as part of the transaction consideration.

share_payments_raw.justification: The documents do not mention any share payments as part of the transaction consideration.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The documents do not mention a combined cash and share payment as part of the transaction consideration.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The documents do not mention any shares being issued as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: The documents do not mention any shares being issued, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is specified as a monetary value, not a drilling meterage.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The project's share is A$400,000, calculated as one-third of the total A$1.2 million expenditure commitment shared across the Yuengroon, Ballarat West, and Silver Spoon projects, as stated in the text: 'S2 can earn an 80% interest in the Yuengroon, Ballarat West and Silver Spoon projects by sole-funding total expenditures of A$1.2 million within four years.'

exploration_commitment_desc.value: S2 can earn an 80% interest in the Yuengroon, Ballarat West and Silver Spoon projects by sole-funding total expenditures of A$1.2 million within four years.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: This is a direct quote describing the terms of the option agreement: "S2 can earn an 80% interest in the Yuengroon, Ballarat West and Silver Spoon projects by sole-funding total expenditures of A$1.2 million within four years."

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text mentions a 2% NSR that comes into effect if a joint venture party's interest is diluted below 10%. This is a future, conditional term of a potential JV and not an NSR being acquired or retained as part of the initial transaction consideration. The quote is: "If a party's joint venture interest is diluted below 10%, it will automatically convert to a 2% net smelter return royalty."

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text does not specify the coverage area for the Ballarat West project.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text does not specify the coverage area for the Ballarat West project.

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain any statement of a mineral resource for the Ballarat West project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text does not provide a stock ticker or exchange for the buyer, S2 Resources Corp. The ticker mentioned (TSXV: OZ) belongs to the seller, Valkea Resources Corp.
